events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for returning a purchase and getting money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer regarding their recent jacket order.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket. I'll be happy to assist you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 458923. The jacket is new, I tried it on once but haven't worn it outside or damaged it.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated the refund process. You will receive a prepaid return label by email and once we receive the jacket, your money will be refunded within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick assistance. I will wait for the return label and send the jacket back soon.
The refund case is now resolved with the return label sent. Please let us know if you encounter any issues during the return process.
Dear customer, we wanted to check in to ensure you received the return label and if your refund has been processed to your satisfaction.
The case has been officially closed after confirming the refund was successfully issued and the customer expressed satisfaction.
